INSERT INTO COMMENTS_HISTORY_READ( COMM_ID , REFERENCE_ID , REFERENCE_DIV , READ_YN , CREATOR , CREATED_DATE ) SELECT T1.COMM_ID ,T1.REFERENCE_ID ,T1.REFERENCE_DIV ,'Y' ,#{loginUserName} ,now() FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY T1 WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM COMMENTS_HISTORY_READ T2 WHERE T1.comm_id = T2.comm_id AND T1.reference_id = T2.reference_id AND T1.reference_div = T2.reference_div AND T2.creator = #{loginUserName} ) AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('19', '10', '12', '14', '20') AND T1.CREATOR <> #{loginUserName} AND T1.CREATED_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval -7 day), '%Y%m%d') AND T1.CREATED_DATE <= now() AND T1.CONTENTS IS NOT NULL AND T1.CONTENTS <> ''
AND ( ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( A1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PROJECT_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PRJ_ID = T1.REFERENCE_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}) )) ) ) ) ) OR ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PARTNER_ID FROM PARTNER_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( A1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PARTNER_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PARTNER_ID = T1.REFERENCE_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}) )) ) ) ) ) )
AND ( ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (A1.REVIEWER = #{loginUserName} OR IFNULL(A1.REVIEWER, '') = '')) ) OR ( T1.REFERENCE_ID IN ( SELECT A1.PARTNER_ID FROM PARTNER_MASTER A1 WHERE A1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (A1.REVIEWER = #{loginUserName} OR IFNULL(A1.REVIEWER, '') = '')) ) )
